scripts.test:full-env: yarn run start && yarn run test
scripts.test:full-env:rebuild: yarn run rebuild && yarn run test:full-env
scripts.test:docker: yarn run start && yarn run rebuild backoffice-e2e && yarn run docker-compose run -- --rm backoffice-e2e
scripts.test:docker:rebuild: yarn run rebuild && yarn run test:docker
scripts.start:full-env: yarn run docker-compose up -- --force-recreate -d git && yarn run docker-compose up -- -d authoring api
scripts.test:docker:authoring: yarn run docker-compose build authoring backoffice-e2e && yarn run start:full-env && yarn run docker-compose run -- --rm backoffice-e2e yarn run test:authoring
scripts.test:full-env:authoring: yarn run docker-compose build authoring && yarn run start:full-env && sleep 5 && yarn run test:authoring
